class.name: HingeJoint3D
class.brief_description: A physics joint that restricts the rotation of a 3D physics body around an axis relative to another physics body.
class.description: A physics joint that restricts the rotation of a 3D physics body around an axis relative to another physics body. For example, Body A can be a [StaticBody3D] representing a door hinge that a [RigidBody3D] rotates around.
